28. $y=\cfrac{x^2-3x+2}{|x-2|}=\cfrac{(x-2)(x-1)}{|x-2|}=\begin{cases} x-1,\ x>2,\\ 1-x,\ x<2.\end{cases}.$
$$% TIKZ_ID{task028-solution-fig1}
